descriptions:
['Description• BUA 9,600 sqft
 • Plot 11,000 sqft
 • G +2 story Tip Mansion
 • Private Beach front
 • Panoramic sea views
 • Roof terrace
 • Infinity pool
 • 24 hour security
 • Available now
 • Contact Alexander +971508826124
Alexander at Dacha real estate is delighted to present to the market one of 5 Exquisite Tip Villas situated on Palm Jumeirah. 
This specific prime piece of luxury real estate boasts over 9,600 Sq.Ft. built up area and sits on a generous plot of 11,000 Sq.Ft. The location is unbeatable for beach front living, arriving at the residence you have private access via a secure entry gate, in essence, you have two sets of security keeping your home safe, secure, and most certainly private. 
The moment you step inside you will appreciate that this truly is a step above the rest with a huge entrance atrium, glass floor to ceiling doors that open up onto the terrace, pool and private beach with views of Dubai marina skyline the distance. 
The villa offers five generous bedrooms suits, a number of different living spaces from informal to impressive formal areas for guest entertaining. The villa also benefits a gymnasium on the second floor, games room, and roof top terrace. Out in the rear garden you have a huge terrace and outdoor dining area situated next to the pool, evening sunsets will be second to none with the majestic Dubai Marina skyline and 360 degree sea view. 
To truly appreciate this property please call Alexander today on: +971508826124.']

descriptions:
["DescriptionIt is our great pleasure to present to every one our wonderful Villa for sale.
Area Size: 150X150 or 22,500 square foot
Selling Price: 5,000,000 AED
This amazing villa is located at KCA and it has 8 spacious Bedrooms, 9 bathrooms, halls, dining and living area, Kitchens with cupboards, Private entrance and Parking, yard. Drivers room and maids room are also available.
Khalifa City A is on the main highway to Dubai, about 30 kilometers from Abu Dhabi, and is close to Abu Dhabi International Airport. It has around 600-700 houses and an adjacent to the prestigious Al Raha Beach project.
Khalifa City A is one the most popular area of renting villas in the capital city. In this area guide, you have access to in-depth information about living in the area and what to anticipate if you are planning on moving to Khalifa City A Abu Dhabi. 
For more details and inquiry please don't hesitate to contact us.
Mobile Number: +971507775080
Landline: +97126336226
Email: Info@seniorsrealestate.ae"]
